input_args.passage: 'Paul Molitor | Paul Leo Molitor (born August 22, 1956), nicknamed "Molly" and "the Ignitor", is an American former professional baseball player and manager.'
input_args.claim: 'However, the question asks for the player who had a perfect game against "The Ignitor\'s" team in 1998, so we can infer that David Wells had a perfect game against Paul Molitor\'s team.'
